mapper.insert: insert into OemAccount (OemId, TotalAmount, FreezeAmount, SeoAmountNeed) values (#{oemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freezeamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seoamountneed,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select OemId, TotalAmount, FreezeAmount, SeoAmountNeed from OemAccount
